name: Decimal expansion of the expected number of steps to termination by self-trapping of a self-avoiding random walk on the square lattice.
comment: The average walk length determined by 1.2*10^12 simulations is 70.75915 +- 0.00010
link: Hugo Pfoertner, Results for the 2-dimensional Self-Trapping Random Walk.
xref: Cf. A378903 (The expected walk length on the cubic lattice).
Cf. A077483 (Probability of the occurrence of each walk length).
author: _Yi Yang_, Mar 11 2025
